snippet.title: Nezumi Man Playthrough: Part 1 - Butter Nezumi
snippet.description:
I'm taking a break from Mugen videos again until I can come up with another idea. For now, I'm branching into a game I discovered recently called Nezumi Man.

For those of you that don't know, Nezumi Man is a classic Megaman-styled game. It has some pretty wacky enemies, some interesting stages, as well as being challenging in some areas. I highly recomend trying it out if your a fan of the classic Megaman games. You can download Nezumi Man from here (at least, this is where I found it):
http://funeffect.com/wp/tag/nezumi/

After some consideration, I've decided to make this into a full playthrough. Thank you to the people who commented giving their suggestions on whether or not I should continue, both here and through messaging services.

That's it for now, and as always, enjoy the video. ^^
